column4: Why does Linux have to be so darn crappy and annoying?  I always get the same damn problems everytime I try Linux.   VIdeo works without the video drivers, but I want the video drivers.  All I get with the video drivers is 640x480 screen resolution.
nvidia geforce fx 5200 compaq mv900 monitor.
people are less likely to help you if you call their hobby 'crappy'.
